views.markdown:
- Fixed iPad crashes - Fixed YouTube crashing when the inline option wasn't selected - iPad support for the Alien Blue HD app.
- Added an alternative (Tweetbot like) browser behavior option. When enabled, the browser will open new links in the same window as opposed to pushing a new one. The back button on the navigation bar is used to navigate back in the browser until there are no more pages to go back to. This option can be used to fix things like twitter images not opening.
- i.redditupload.com images can now be opened in full optimal view (does NOT work with touch preview yet).
- Very basic Multireddit support. When syncing subscriptions, a folder called “Multireddits” will be created and populated with your multireddits from reddit.com. At this time only viewing them is supported.
- Removed the long fade outs on YouTube videos.
- Added custom AlienBlue++ announcements.
- Hopefully removed ads
- Added a settings toggle for inline YouTube and autoplay.
misc. bug fixes

Now forces HTTPS when loading anything from Imgur.
Misc. bug fixes.
Fixed an issue causing settings to not save Fixed preference editing issue caused by Pangu untether update 1.1

- Fixed a lot of behind the scenes stuff.
- Alert sheets and YouTube downloading have been removed due to them not being worth the effort in maintaining considering how many people used them.
- The gif download bar has been changed and now follows you as you navigate through the app.
- Added a secret
- Fixed settings panel for latest Alien Blue
- Added Night-mode compatibility for the settings panel
- Removed custom share sheets in favor of ones provided by Alien Blue. The titles of the share links are removed.
-Updated for latest Alien Blue
-Under new developer and written from scratch
-Save GIF/Videos/Images to camera roll
-Copy GIF/Images to your pasteboard
-Show Full Karma in sidebar
-Fixed crash on iOS 7
